item.name: Credentials-API
Credential Offer
Notifies the holder about the availability of a particular credential for issuance
Presentation
Issues a new presentation query, that contains either a DIF presentation definition, or a list of scopes
Storage
Writes a set of credentials into storage
DID-API
DID Web Resolver
Identity-API
DID
Adds a service endpoint to a particular DID document.
Get all DID documents across all Participant Contexts. Requires elevated access.
Get state of a DID document
Publish an (existing) DID document. The DID is expected to exist in the database.
Query for DID documents.
Removes a service endpoint from a particular DID document.
Replaces a service endpoint of a particular DID document.
Un-Publish an (existing) DID document. The DID is expected to exist in the database.
Key Pairs
Adds a new key pair to a ParticipantContext. Note that the key pair is either generated, or the private key is expected to be found in the vault.
Finds a KeyPairResource by ID.
Finds all KeyPairResources for a particular ParticipantContext.
Get all KeyPair resources across all Participant Contexts. Requires elevated access.
Revokes (=removes) a particular key pair, identified by their ID and create a new successor key.
Rotates (=retires) a particular key pair, identified by their ID and optionally create a new successor key.
Sets a KeyPairResource to the ACTIVE state. Will fail if the current state is anything other than ACTIVE or CREATED.
Participant Context
Activates a ParticipantContext. This operation is idempotent, i.e. activating an already active ParticipantContext is a NOOP.
Creates a new ParticipantContext object.
Delete a ParticipantContext.
Get all DID documents across all Participant Contexts. Requires elevated access.
Gets ParticipantContexts by ID.
Regenerates the API token for a ParticipantContext and returns the new token.
Updates a ParticipantContext's roles. Note that this is an absolute update, that means all roles that the Participant should have must be submitted in the body. Requires elevated privileges.
Verifiable Credentials
Adds a new VerifiableCredential into the system.
Delete a VerifiableCredential.
Finds a VerifiableCredential by ID.
Finds a credential request by ID.
Get all VerifiableCredentials across all Participant Contexts. Requires elevated access.
Query VerifiableCredentials by type.
Triggers a credential request that is send to the issuer via the DCP protocol.
Update an existing VerifiableCredential.
Issuance-API
CredentialRequest-API
Requests the issuance of one or several verifiable credentials from an issuer
CredentialRequestStatus-API
Requests status information about an issuance request from an issuer
IssuerMetadata-API
Requests information about the capabilities of this issuer.
IssuerAdmin-API
IssuerServiceAttestationAdmin-API
Creates an attestation definition in the runtime.
Deletes an attestation definition.
Query attestation definitions
IssuerServiceCredentialDefinitionAdmin-API
Adds a new credential definition.
Deletes a credential definition by its ID.
Gets a credential definition by its ID.
Gets all credential definitions for a certain query.
Updates credential definition.
IssuerServiceCredentialsAdmin-API
Checks the revocation status of a credential with the given ID for the given participant.
Query credentials, possibly across multiple participants.
Resumes a credential with the given ID for the given participant. Resumed credentials will be removed from the Revocation List.
Revokes a credential with the given ID for the given participant. Revoked credentials will be added to the Revocation List
Suspends a credential with the given ID for the given participant. Suspended credentials will be added to the Revocation List. Suspension is reversible.
Triggers a DCP CredentialOffer message being sent to the holder.
IssuerServiceHolderAdmin-API
Adds a new holder.
Gets all holders for a certain query.
Gets metadata for a certain holder.
Updates holder data.
IssuerServiceIssuanceProcessAdmin-API
Gets all issuance processes for a certain query.
Gets an issuance process by its ID.
STS-API
Secure Token Service Api
StatusList-API
Resolves and returns a verifiable credential by ID
